definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver

sentences.english: You have spelt this word wrong.
There are too many misprints in the book. ;
Keep a list of words that you often misspell.
sentences.chinese: 列一张你经常拼错字的表。

sentences.english: So is a misspelling or inaccurate version of the job title that your applying for.
sentences.chinese: 同样，如果你拼错了你的工作头衔，那也是很糟糕的。

sentences.english: Also be careful with names that people can easily misspell .
sentences.chinese: 记住，千万不要挑选那些人们容易拼错的域名。

sentences.english: Added an option to produce a list of misspelled words from standard input.
sentences.chinese: 标准输入中产生拼错词列表。

sentences.english: Because I often misspell the word, therefore I very much pay attention to English now the spelling.
sentences.chinese: 因为我常把单词拼错，所以现在我很注意英语的拼法。
看看这些拼错的单词吧。

sentences.english: His eye fell on a misspelled word.
sentences.chinese: 他的目光落在一个拼错的词上。

sentences.english: Please circumscribe the words which are wrongly spelled.
You can tell that watch is a fake because the words carved on the back are misspelled.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看出这表是赝品，由于刻在背面的字拼错了。

sentences.english: This is because the Supplier Name for Vegie-spread is misspelled.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为产品“寻呼机”的供应商名称被拼错了。

sentences.english: What will really happen if she misspells a word?
sentences.chinese: 如果拼错了一个单词，会怎么样？

sentences.english: And never, ever, spell someone’s name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 再就是永远不要拼错别人的名字。

sentences.english: He gently chides his students every time they misspelled a word.
sentences.chinese: 每当他的学生拼错一个词时，他都温和地责备他们。

definition: to err/to dial a wrong number/to make a typo
to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
